channel.title: Software on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Software on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Using Structure
item.description: Background Structure is a brilliant intellectual work. Structure is also not user-friendly. In fact, one might go so far as to say it’s sometimes user-hostile. User hostility extremely unforgiving input file parsing manual is not terribly user friendly program is not user friendly GUI version isn’t great for long runs (i.e. modern data) two different parameter files there are a million parameters default plots suck and aren’t dichromat friendly runs on a single thread/cpu and takes a while depending on your data So, using Structure is largely about navigating these pitfalls.
